mapper.select: select student.student_id,student.student_name,isCompletion(student.student_id) as result from task,completion,student,courselist where task.task_id=#{taskId} and task.courselist_id=courselist.courselist_id and courselist.class_id=student.class_id and task.task_id=completion.completion_id
mapper.insert:
insert into completion
" completion_id",
task_id,
student_id,
submission_time,
completion_score,
completion_content,
#{completionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{submissionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{completionScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{completionContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update completion
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
submission_time = #{submissionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
completion_score = #{completionScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
completion_content = #{completionContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where " completion_id" = #{completionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update completion set task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submission_time = #{submissionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, completion_score = #{completionScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, completion_content = #{completionContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where " completion_id" = #{completionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
